title: Do Dooni Chaar
short_cast: Rishi Kapoor, Neetu Singh, Aditi Vasudev, Archit Krishna, Akhilendra Mishra, Natasha Rastogi, Manoj Bakshi, Supriya Shukla
cast: Rishi Kapoor, Neetu Singh, Aditi Vasudev, Archit Krishna, Akhilendra Mishra, Natasha Rastogi, Manoj Bakshi, Supriya Shukla
m_desc: Suitable for children 7 and above and under parental guidance for persons under age of 7
desc: A struggling math teacher holds down a second job to keep his family afloat. But when he receives a wedding invitation, he's determined to attend.
